tasks.name: Wireframing
tasks.text: Create low-fidelity designs that outline the basic structure and layout of the product or service

tasks.name: First design concept
tasks.text: Create a concept based on the research and insights gathered during the discovery phase of the project

tasks.name: Design library
tasks.text: Create a collection of reusable design elements, such as buttons, forms, and navigation menus.

tasks.name: Customer Journey Mapping
tasks.text: Identify the key touchpoints and pain points in the customer journey, and to develop strategies to improve the overall customer

tasks.name: Persona development
tasks.text: Create user personas based on the research data to represent different user groups and their characteristics, goals, and behaviors

tasks.name: Competitor research
tasks.text: Research competitors and identify weakness and strengths each of them. Comparing their product features, quality

tasks.name: Branding, visual identity
tasks.text: Create a brand identity system that includes a logo, typography, color palette, and brand guidelines

tasks.name: Marketing materials
tasks.text: Create a branded materials such as business cards, flyers, brochures, and social media graphics
